## CustomErrorConstructor type

Constructor parameters for creating a CustomError instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CustomErrorConstructor<CodeType> = {
  message: string;
  name: string;
  code: CodeType;
  logLevel: LogLevel;
  meta?: {};
  cause?: unknown;
};
```

**References:** [LogLevel](./error-handler.loglevel.md)
